channel.title: How i make a pk box in my server
channel.description:
hi i have a server on hamachi i want make a pk box but how can you sent me a mail whit instructions please?
i want a pk box please :( :(

item.title: How i make a pk box in my server
item.dc:creator: @vovchik30 vovchik30
item.description:
@vovchik30 wrote:

on tuxscape they have a pk box when u tele there u cant be attaked because its a safe spot i looked every were people put stuff like search for nonwild but that doesnt work for delta so wat do i search now[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2009, 08:58:43 am[/size][hr]btw i liked ur idea but wat if the players get ataked
like range or maged [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2009, 11:14:27 am[/size][hr]nm about the range and maged part i mis understood something

item.title: How i make a pk box in my server
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

well check the "home"teleport and copy it a bit kinda easy.
and to add objects like a bank boot check the the client.java and search for public void NewObjects()
You should see a list of new objects and you will notice how to make new ones :d.

Read full topic
item.source: How i make a pk box in my server

item.title: How i make a pk box in my server
item.dc:creator: @Stiflex Stiflex
item.description:
@Stiflex wrote:

well i do not know how to make from safe to wild or anything… but i have an idea
go somewhere idk like demonic ruins? and make a bank there (add object) and make walls whit something armound the ruins and make a teleport sumthing like ::pkbox or ::pkland

item.title: How i make a pk box in my server
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

Well if your lucky then you got a server where almost complete runscape is Wild.
if this is the case then Just make a teleport command “pkbox”
choose a spot thats closed in by walls or something.
